message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I see you recognize the value of the product. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $105 as my offer for the product.
